unnormalised: Reliance JioFiber users in Mumbai are fuming after receiving hefty bills this month. Many are reporting charges exceeding Rs. 2000, despite being on plans that cost around Rs. 1000-1500. Some are saying the increased charges reflect newly implemented 'convenience fees', but Jio hasn't made any official announcements 'bout this yet. Customers are taking to Twitter to complain and ask for clarification.
normalised: Reliance JioFiber users in Mumbai are fuming after receiving hefty bills this month. Many are reporting charges exceeding rupee two thousand, despite being on plans that cost around rupee one thousand to one thousand five hundred. Some are saying the increased charges reflect newly implemented 'convenience fees', but Jio hasn't made any official announcements about this yet. Customers are taking to Twitter to complain and ask for clarification.

unnormalised: A lot of folks are noticing discrepancies. For instance, Aisha Khan tweeted that her bill jumped from ₹1299 to ₹2348 without any prior notification. Others are reporting similar issues, with charges for 'unspecified services' or inflated data usage. This has left many wondering if there's some kinda system-wide glitch or if Jio is quietly hiking prices.
